title: Gaza窶的srael barrier
summary: The Gaza窶的srael barrier is a border barrier located on the Israeli side of the Gaza窶的srael border.[1] There are two main crossing points on the Gaza窶的srael border: the northern Erez Crossing and the eastern Karni Crossing used only for cargo. Other cargo crossing points are the Kerem Shalom border crossing on the border with Egypt and the Sufa Crossing further north.[2]
